game.name: Orbit Avoider
game.description:
Space is a world where every time you meet the mysterious obstacles. Today you have suddenly reached out a space where you have to drive circles around the spacecraft. Your difficulties will keep increasing as you move further. Join Orbit Avoider and be prepared to put your quick reflexes and hand-eye coordination skills to the test! Your objective in this brand new action-packed game is to dodge the alien bullets while orbiting around in a circle. Many new and exciting surprises are waiting for you. 
Your enemy aliens will keep firing bullets at you and you have to focus on pivoting back and forth to avoid them while collecting coins to improve your score. The rate at which enemy fire bullets increases each time when you clear all of the coins. Control your spaceship by clicking or tapping the screen in this HTML5 shooting game! The key formula to avoid the bullets is to click on the right time. You might have confused where to go since the enemy will shoot multiple bullets at the same time. 
Be careful and try to open your eyes all the time to get your job done nicely! The top of the screen will show you how many coins you have grabbed now. New coins will begin appearing on the screen when you grab all the coins. Play wisely to beat your own high score in this one of the best action games for boys that are free to play online without download! If you like this game, do not forget to try out our exclusive collection of other cool space games to have an extra fun dose.
